Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at InterCityHotel Berlin Ostbahnhof in Berlin (Friedrichshain), you'll be convenient to O2 World and Alexanderplatz. This family-friendly hotel is close to Checkpoint Charlie Museum and Brandenburg Gate.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 163 guestrooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of InterCityHotel Berlin Ostbahnhof. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of InterCityHotel Berlin Ostbahnhof. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

O2 World - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
East Side Gallery - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Oberbaum Bridge - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Simon-Dach-Strasse - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Alexa Shopping Center - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Berlin Conference Center - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Alexanderplatz - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Nikolaikirche - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Red Town Hall - 2 km / 1.2 mi
TV Tower - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Volkspark Friedrichshain - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Marienkirche - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
DDR Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Aquadom - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Schlossplatz - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 14.4 km / 8.9 mi

The preferred airport for InterCityHotel Berlin Ostbahnhof is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to InterCityHotel Berlin are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 10.4 km / 6.4 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schonefeld) - 14.4 km / 9 mi

The preferred airport for InterCityHotel Berlin is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).
